timetable.importDescription: Upload and import timetable data from ÓMAN XML files
timetable.uploadFileDescription: Select an XML file exported from ÓMAN to import timetable data
timetable.importNameDescription: Give this import a descriptive name so you can identify it later.
timetable.validFromDescription: Select the date when this timetable becomes active.
timetable.clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
timetable.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your XML file here
timetable.supportedFormats: Supported format: XML files from ÓMAN
timetable.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload an XML file.
timetable.importSuccessMessage: The timetable has been imported and all related data has been updated.
timetable.importInfoPoint1: Only XML files exported from ÓMAN are supported
timetable.importInfoPoint2: The import process will update all timetable-related data including cohorts, subjects, teachers, and lessons
timetable.importInfoPoint3: Existing data will be preserved and matched with new data where possible
timetable.importInfoPoint4: The import process may take a few moments depending on the size of the file
